segments.text: I feel terrible for the woman, she’s completely unaware of the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and her foot is already wet, but she doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she’s just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s just exhausted or if she’s really that oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting slippery, and someone is going to get hurt if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and it’s only a matter of time before he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for a cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a sad situation, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would help her before things get worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s heartbreaking to see her so unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
